text: ishmailpur is a Gram panchayat in hajipur, vaishali district, bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==panchayat office== panchayat bhawan ishmailpur (पंचायत भवन ishmailpur ) Panchayati Raj Department,Government of Bihar page number 7 ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance 7 KM) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== SH 74 (State highway 74) And gandak river Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are 10 villages in this panchayatministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India Census Villages mapped for ishmailpur Gram Panchayat,Hajipur,vaishali,Bihar Report printed on 24/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n | !villages |- | 1||||Ismailpur |- | 2||||Jazira Ismailpur |- | 3||||Rampur Dumri |- | 4||||Minapur Rae |- | 5||||Rampur Dumri |- | 6||||Rampur Dumri |- | 7||||Kutubpur Dumri |- | 8||||Minapur Rae |- | 9||||Chak Ataullah |- | 10||||Chak Saidkhan |- | |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
